drug.name: Neisseria meningitidis group w-135 capsular polysaccharide diphtheria toxoid conjugate antigen
drug.description: Neisseria meningitidis group w-135 capsular polysaccharide diphtheria toxoid conjugate antigen is an active intramuscular immunization for the prophylaxis of invasive meningococcal disease caused by *Neisseria meningitidis* serogroup W-135. The vaccine contains *N. meningitis* serogroup W-135 capsular polysaccharide antigens that are purified and individually conjugated to diphtheria toxoid protein that are extracted from *Corynebacterium diphtheriae* grown in another culture.

synonyms.synonym: Neisseria meningitidis serogroup W-135 capsular polysaccharide diphtheria toxoid protein conjugate vaccine

mixture.name: Menactra
mixture.ingredients: Neisseria meningitidis group a capsular polysaccharide diphtheria toxoid conjugate antigen + Neisseria meningitidis group c capsular polysaccharide diphtheria toxoid conjugate antigen + Neisseria meningitidis group w-135 capsular polysaccharide diphtheria toxoid conjugate antigen + Neisseria meningitidis group y capsular polysaccharide diphtheria toxoid conjugate antigen
